title: Special gas distribution in Colombo and across country: LITRO
body_lines: A special allocation was made by the LITRO Gas Limited to dispatch nearly 10,000 domestic gas cylinders in the Colombo district tomorrow.
They said the gas cylinders would be distributed among 25 selected dealers in 25 cities in Colombo.
Accordingly, 8,692 12.5kg gas cylinders, 295 5 kg cylinders, and 210  2.3 kg gas cannisters will be distributed.
Meanwhile, LITRO has decided to distribute domestic gas cylinders among 192 selected dealers around the country. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
